Hello there, I am Umair Durrani

I am a transportation data scientist and traffic modeler. I study and develop models of road users for traffic flow modeling. I am also an instructor of Data Analytics at St. Clair College, Windsor, Ontario. I teach Statistics and data analytics using Python, R, Tableau, Excel, etc. I also supervise capstone projects of students from diverse backgrounds.

I speak English, Urdu and R (programming) fluently. You can get in touch with me via email or twitter.

Interests

  • Human Factors in Autonomous Vehicles

  • Driver Behaviour & Driver State Monitoring Systems

  • Machine Learning Applications in Transportation

  • Intelligent Transportation Systems

Education

    • Ph.D. Civil Engineering

      University of Windsor, Ontario, Canada

    • B.Sc. Transportation Engineering

      University of Engineering and Technology, Lahore, Pakistan
